ds-desc1: A unique place in its genre
ds-desc3: Intense rhythm, all-night party at Logia
ds-desc6: The place where reggaeton is lived to the maximum
ds-miranda: A modern and stylish disco known for its vibrant atmosphere and top-tier DJs.
ds-perro_negro: A popular spot among locals and tourists, famous for its eclectic music and lively dance floor.
ds-tutaina: Known for its traditional Colombsian music and festive atmosphere, perfect for experiencing local culture.
ds-clementina: An elegant place with a sophisticated atmosphere, showcasing a mix of electronic and house music.
ds-dulcinea: A welcoming disco with a relaxed atmosphere, perfect for socializing and enjoying good music.
ds-logia: A modern disco with a wide selection of cocktails and an energetic dance floor.
